ai-tha-ap272:1.2_0: he is worthy of religious donation,
ai-tha-ap272:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap272:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap272:3.4_0: This is the fruit and result.
ai-tha-ap272:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap272:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
ai-tha-ap272:7.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on lamps is finished.
ai-tha-ap272:9.5_0: An astute person comes to them
ai-tha-ap272:9.6_0: And its root is only a palm tree.”
